titles.title: A bill to improve requirements relating to establishment of a consortium of universities to advise the Secretary of Defense on cybersecurity matters, and for other purposes.
University Cybersecurity Consortia Improvement Act of 2021
University Cybersecurity Consortia Improvement Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
University Cybersecurity Consortia Improvement Act of 2021
This bill provides that a consortium of universities, instead of one or more consortia, must be established by the Department of Defense (DOD) to advise DOD on specified cybersecurity matters.
